String.string: <font size='50'>You've been caught! Prepare for monster swarms!</font>
<font size='50'>Another wave of monsters!</font>
<font size='50'>Cloud bridge activated.</font>
<font size='50'>Mystical shortcut activated.</font>
<font size='50'>The whetstone has been destroyed. Monsters already summoned become stronger.</font>
<font size='50'>Monsters will be summoned soon.</font>
<font size='50'>Moving bridge activated.</font>
<font size='50'>The entrance to Mockinghall will close in 10 seconds.</font>
<font size='50'>The bars surrounding the bridge actuator are gone.</font>
<font size='50'>The door is open.</font>
<font size='50'>Monsters will spawn in 20 seconds.</font>
<font size='50'>Monsters will spawn in 10 seconds.</font>
<font size='50'>Monsters will spawn in 5 seconds.</font>
<font size='50'>Monsters are now spawning.</font>
<font size='50'>Felbane is recovering at an astounding rate. Its immunity to siege weapons disappears.</font>
<font size='50'>Bandersnatch's attacks are getting faster.</font>
<font size='50'>Because you didn't defeat Kagrom within 20 seconds, Morgak will be summoned again.</font>
<font size='50'>Because you didn't defeat Morgak within 20 seconds, Kagrom will be summoned again.</font>
<font size='50'>It has been cleared!</font>
<font size='50'>The cage around Morgak will close in 10 seconds.</font>
<font size='50'>The cage around Kagrom will close in 10 seconds.</font>
<font size='50'>Break the trap before time runs out.</font>
<font size='50'>The entrance door will close soon.</font>
<font size='50'>Master Keye appeared.</font>
<font size='50'>Master Keye's mystical shortcut has been activated.</font>
<font size='50'>The stairs to the upper gallery open.</font>
<font size='50'>One-Eyed Jack is speeding up.</font>
<font size='50'>You've received a special power.</font>
<font size='50'>Stay away from the dangerous device in the center!</font>
<font size='50'>You have 20 seconds to defeat the remaining boss monster.</font>
<font size='50'>You have 30 seconds to defeat the remaining boss monster.</font>
<font size='50'>Who are you? How dare you invade my castle!</font>
<font size='50'>You'll never make it out, and you'll never take what's mine!</font>
<font size='50'>Because you didn't defeat Kagrom within 30 seconds, Morgak will be summoned again.</font>
<font size='50'>Because you didn't defeat Morgak within 30 seconds, Kagrom will be summoned again.</font>
<font size='50'>Felbane loses immunity to siege weapons and begins casting HP recovery magic.</font>
